医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
数据科学在健康研究中的应用造福非洲人口研究人员讨论了数据科学对于健康研究的重要性，这将使非洲人口受益匪浅。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Application-of-data-science-in-health-research-to-benefit-the-African-population.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Application-of-data-science-in-health-research-to-benefit-the-African-population.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f42243f1-4ea5-4943-a302-7f177ac19799 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 15:41:00 -0400 Application of data science in health research to benefit the African population
乳酸菌治疗炎症性肠病的功效乳酸菌在治疗炎症性肠病中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Effectiveness-of-Lactobacillus-in-treating-itis-bowel-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Effectiveness-of-Lactobacillus-in-treating-lingual-bowel-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c0ff794-fc89-42d0-ba3b-db965b850a06 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 15:34:00 -0400 Effectiveness of Lactobacillus in treating inflammatory bowel disease
Aventa Genomics 宣布推出 Aventa FusionPlus，这是首个针对实体癌症患者的 3D 基因组学临床测试Aventa™ Genomics, LLC 是一家由 Arima Genomics, Inc. 和 Protean BioDiagnostics Inc. 合资成立的临床实验室，今天宣布推出 Aventa FusionPlus，这是一种用于检测基因融合的下一代测序 (NGS) 测试，福尔马林固定石蜡包埋 (FFPE) 肿瘤组织中 361 个基因的易位和重排。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Aventa-Genomics-Announces-Launch-of-Aventa-FusionPlus-the-First-3D-Genomics-Clinical-Test-for-Patients-with-Solid-癌症.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Aventa-Genomics-Announces-Launch-of-Aventa-FusionPlus-the-First-3D-Genomics-Clinical-Test-for-Patients-with-Solid- Cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70326f12-6ff3-4565-a39b-edc5940140d4 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 11:49:00 -0400
Evonetix 在伦敦帝国理工学院建立第一个 DNA 合成开发平台外部放置标志着 Evonetix 台式 DNA 合成技术开发的一个重要里程碑，为客户使用和商业化做好准备。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Evonetix-places-first-DNA-synthesis-development-platform-at-Imperial-College-London.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Evonetix-places-first-DNA-synthesis-development-platform-at-Imperial-College-London.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a52697fa-cbd4-4501-8fc9-4fa4fe79e031 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 11:37:00 -0400
FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies 总裁兼首席执行官 Lars Petersen 任命 Maja Pedersen 为首席质量官FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies 总裁兼首席执行官 Lars Petersen 今天宣布任命新的战略领导层，以支持公司度过下一个增长阶段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/FUJIFILM-Diosynth-Biotechnologies-President-and-CEO-Lars-Petersen-appoints-Maja-Pedersen-as-Chief-Quality-Officer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/FUJIFILM-Diosynth-Biotechnologies-President-and-CEO-Lars-Petersen-appoints-Maja-Pedersen-as-Chief-Quality-Officer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c15f45e-6766-4a6e-9fcf-46f207b6ef72 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 11:27:00 -0400
赛诺菲和梯瓦宣布独家合作提供炎症性肠病治疗赛诺菲（欧洲证券交易所股票代码：SAN 和纳斯达克股票代码：SNY）和 Teva Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd.（纽约证券交易所和特拉维夫证券交易所股票代码：TEVA）的美国子公司 Teva Pharmaceuticals 今天宣布合作，共同开发资产 TEV'574 并共同商业化，该资产目前处于阶段2b 治疗溃疡性结肠炎和克罗恩病（两种炎症性肠病）的临床试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Sanofi-and-Teva-announce-exclusive-collaboration-to-deliver-itis-bowel-disease-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Sanofi-and-Teva-announce-exclusive-collaboration-to-deliver-itis-bowel-disease-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67a77395-eb8a-4ea0-9cc2-a40f1d351f41 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 11:24:00 -0400
Carol Stonham MBE、注册护士、理学硕士、女王护士和 PCRS 政策负责人加入 Bedfont® 医疗咨询委员会Bedfont® Scientific Ltd 是呼吸分析医疗设备技术的领先创新者，很自豪地宣布备受尊敬和认可的呼吸保健专家 Carol Stonham 加入其备受尊敬的医疗委员会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Carol-Stonham-MBE-RN-MSc-Queene28099s-Nurse-and-Policy-Lead-PCRS-joins-the-Bedfontc2ae-Medical-Advisory-Board。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Carol-Stonham-MBE-RN-MSc-Queene28099s-Nurse-and-Policy-Lead-PCRS-joins-the-Bedfontc2ae-Medical-Advisory-Board。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f37cccf-5bba-4c7a-aa73-7b8ef34cbd68 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 10:40:00 -0400 Carol Stonham MBE, RN, MSc, Queen’s Nurse, and Policy Lead PCRS joins the Bedfont® Medical Advisory Board
使用木炉灶与胃癌风险相关研究人员在中美洲洪都拉斯农村地区进行了一项基于人群的研究，采用病例对照设计，研究土著居民使用木炉灶是否与胃癌（包括胃腺癌）风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Wood-cookstove-use-linked-to-gastric-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Wood-cookstove-use-linked-to-gastric-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58369122-4b1e-4b6f-9282-1186a78c6bcc Wed, 04 Oct 2023 09:34:00 -0400 Wood cookstove use linked to gastric cancer risk
研究强调了特应性皮炎患者的异质性，并证明了个性化治疗的前景研究人员调查了特应性皮炎（AD）的内型与表型关联，超出了其一般临床严重程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Study-highlights-the-病人-heterogeneity-in-atopic-dermatitis-and-demonstrates-the-promises-of-personalized-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Study-highlights-the-病人-heterogeneity-in-atopic-dermatitis-and-demonstrates-the-promises-of-personalized-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf6ed4ff-1d3a-4cfb-a85d-7ceefbd95847 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 09:08:00 -0400 Study highlights the patient heterogeneity in atopic dermatitis and demonstrates the promises of personalized treatment
突破性技术有一天可以为脑损伤患者提供量身定制的修复牛津大学研究人员开发的一项突破性技术有一天可以为脑损伤患者提供量身定制的修复方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Breakthrough-technique-could-one-day-provide-tailored-repairs-for-people-with-brain-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Breakthrough-technique-could-one-day-provide-tailored-repairs-for-people-with-brain-injuries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3b21eeb-56dc-40bc-9647-9dbf2d0f8b7e Wed, 04 Oct 2023 09:00:43 -0400 Breakthrough technique could one day provide tailored repairs for people with brain injuries
